title: Execute (TOUCHDOWN)
body:
Hello fellow summoners! As a replacement for Hide & Seek, we now have Execute (aka Draft Racing)! There are other forums based on this type of gameplay, but here is an official set of rules that a draft race can go by.

Objective of the game:
Kill yourself to earn your team a point!
Each person on either team must execute to the enemy fountain. Simple as that! However, **you may not camp in the fountain**. Along with this, let's look at other things not allowed!

Don'ts:
-Taking towers
-Taking Baron
-Taking Herald
-{{item:3512}} 
-{{item:3060}} 
-Farming in lanes
-Camping at **fountain**

Do's:
-Buffs
-Dragon
-Drain EXP by sitting in lane
-Wards (including Scuttle)
-Jungling
-Recall

Now just like Hide & Seek, there are banned champions:
{{champion:28}}  Her passive
{{champion:4}}  Ultimate
{{champion:17}} Passive
{{champion:35}} Stealth early game
{{champion:29}} Stealth early game
{{champion:80}} Ultimate
{{champion:223}} Ultimate
and others! (still testing)

Here are some recommended champions to play as:
{{champion:432}}  {{champion:154}}  {{champion:114}}  {{champion:103}}  {{champion:26}}  {{champion:254}}  {{champion:421}}  {{champion:76}}  {{champion:7}}  {{champion:236}}  {{champion:127}}  {{champion:64}}  {{champion:105}}  {{champion:92}}  {{champion:81}}  {{champion:38}}  {{champion:59}}  {{champion:98}}  {{champion:133}}  {{champion:33}}  {{champion:121}} 

Recommended Summoners:
{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:12}} 

Recommended Items:
-Movement Speed
-CDR
-Vision

How-To-Win:
**Summoner's Rift**
-3v3 die 3 times
-4v4 die 2 times
-5v5 die 1 time
**Howling Abyss**
-1v1 die 5 times
-2v2 die 4 times
-3v3 die 3 times
-4v4 die 2 times
-5v5 die 1 time
**Twisted Treeline**
-1v1 die 5 times
-2v2 die 3 times
-3v3 die 2 times

_**Situational Information**_
Games can last up to 40 minutes to an hour depending on the map and amount of players!

**IF YOU HAVE ANY OTHER SUGGESTIONS PLEASE LET ME KNOW AND TRY IT OUT WITH YOUR FRIENDS!**

Have fun Summoners!
(Feel free to link your gameplay videos of this in the comments!)

replies.body: So the point is to get your champion killed, correct?
specifically by the enemy fountain lol
This sounds like an amazing idea. Though, singed seems like they'd be the easiest champ to play with.

I really dont see singed being strong, provably funny but not strong
{{champion:33}} Rammus outclass him, hes faster and tankier (assuming low income and that your goal is to kill yourself on the nexus)

Rammus with iron elixir, boots of swiftness plus alacrity. plus 20 minute fountain buff, plus dead man's plate = ~1k movement speed, enough to get you almost to the enemy mid lane inhibitor if you take the straight path (no encounters) in around 5 seconds
Another reason why rammus is fun as hell

I thought he'd be a good chaser when the enemy team would try to attack him :P
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Easiest meaning? Haha because I thought he'd be great when being chased to their base. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Lmao, good way to fuck up your KDA XD It'd probs be fun though :D very nice idea {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I don't think your KDA counts custom games but haha thanks!

You'd have to get friends into a custom to play it :P
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
was hoping there would be a club for it. but ty.

Love it, got some questions
---
Why is Twisted Fate banned but not Pantheon or tham kench? Their R has the same effect (in fact tham's R is double the anti-fun, triple anti-fun if we add his W)
Also add the Herald, ZZ'rot and Banner to the 'Dont' list, they got the same effect than nashor.
---
This are some of the champions I would add to 'recomended'
{{champion:38}}  for his R
{{champion:78}}  R seems a great defending skill
{{champion:59}}  R defense tool, E+Q wallhop
{{champion:74}} Passive= free sustain (you cant Back), Q for defense, I dont see him in a great position attacking tho
{{champion:24}} {{champion:55}}  with their wardhops are provably strong too
{{champion:98}}  is literaly 2x1 with the ultimate, E is useful for defending and for raiding
{{champion:40}} {{champion:15}}{{champion:133}} are provably good with that amounts of movement speed, I would need to teat how useful movespeed actualy is
{{champion:412}} Useful for defense with QE and R, and W is great for mini 2x1
{{champion:429}} Vision for days, Q-wallhop, R is somehow useful
{{champion:33}} Speed, tankyness and taunts
{{champion:203}} Q gives a lot of movility, R is somehow useful for a group suicide attemp
{{champion:121}} E jump, R invisible and lots of isolated targets in the jungle waiting to get killed
---
Also I dont understand why is tristana recomended, I should play it myself before judging but her W is a bit unreliable and the R doesnt give anything that you cant get from poppy jarvan or janna

Thank you for the feedback! :) I updated everything and can't wait to hear anything else if you do try it out!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I feel like it should have a sort of 10 minute farming period, as well as having a defending team (stopping executes ) and an offensive team (going for executes). Of course the camping thing would be more enforced with more rules

Yeah that's what I thought to until I played a few games with these set of rules with my friends. It took a while actually haha.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
